    • transition

      boolean transition(Idempotent.State state)
      Transition to a new state Note: Transitioning to the current state will return false
      Parameters:
      state - the new state
      Returns:
      true iif the current state allows the transition to the new state

    • transition

      <T> T transition(Consumer<Idempotent.Transition.Builder<T>> builderConsumer)
      Transition using Transition Builder consumer
      Type Parameters:
      T - return type of the transition
      Parameters:
      builderConsumer - the builder consumer.
      Returns:
      the return type of the transition. For example, a Closeable during open.
